alert.note: Alert for Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 7:54PM EST until March 01 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by runoff from excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Ohio, including the following county, Noble. * WHEN...Until 800 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks and other low-lying locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 751 PM EST, Gauge reports indicate that the West Fork of Duck Creek continues to rise from runoff. Flooding is ongoing in the warned area. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Dudley and Dexter City. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
